rooms.description: You're in a room made of stone.
rooms.detailedDescription: Light is coming through a hole in the ceiling. To the west a flight of stairs leads downward.

features.name: door
features.description: There's a door to the east.
features.detailedDescription: A sturdy wooden door, banded with iron. It's locked.

rooms.detailedDescription: There is a landing after about fifty steps. To the north the stairs continue down; to the east the stairs continue up.

features.name: brazier
features.description: The landing is lit by a brazier on the wall.
features.detailedDescription: A lit brazier with an open flame. Watch it--it's hot.

rooms.detailedDescription: You're in a small closet. From the looks of things it was a storage room at one point but hasn't be used in some time.

features.name: torch
features.description: There's a torch on a shelf.

rooms.description: You're in what appears to be a castle dungeon.
rooms.detailedDescription: Chains hang from the walls, and there are several small cells with mostly rotten doors.

features.name: kazoo
features.description: There is a kazoo on the floor.
features.detailedDescription: A red kazoo. It's a little dusty.

rooms.description: You are in one of the cells.
rooms.detailedDescription: Manacles hang from a rusty peg in the wall.

features.name: rags
features.description: There's a pile of rags in the corner.
features.detailedDescription: An old pile of rags, probably once used as a bed. There's a key underneath.

rooms.description: You are in one of the cells.
rooms.detailedDescription: The broken remains of a wooden cot stand against one wall.

features.name: obstacle
features.description: An obstacle sits against the far wall.
features.detailedDescription: It's an obstacle. You should probably try to move it.

rooms.detailedDescription: Faint light is coming through a hole in the ceiling. You scream, but no one hears you...

rooms.description: You step into one of the cells, but as you do you hear a distinct 'click.' The floor gives way underneath your feet, and you fall a dozen feet into a pit.

features.name: crystal
features.description: There's a crystal on the table.
features.detailedDescription: A small purple crystal. The soft glow seems to pulse slowly.

rooms.description: You are in a large cavern.
rooms.detailedDescription: Crystals embedded in the rock around you glow a soft purple, illuminating the area. Several tunnels branch off from the main cavern.
A large stalagmite fills one corner of the room.
You hear water dripping from somewhere up above.
A small stream splashes out of a fissure in the cave wall, then disappears down a crack at the base of a stalagmite.
Stalagmites and stalactites cover the floor and ceiling. The sound of dripping water is constant in this room.
To the south you see worked stone peeking through the living rock in places.

rooms.description: You are in some kind of shrine.
rooms.detailedDescription: The room is brightly lit with glowing purple crystals.

features.name: pedestal
features.description: There is a pedestal in the middle of the room.
features.detailedDescription: A pedestal formed from a cluster of glowing purple crystals. It looks like something small is meant to be placed on top.
